title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

title: Above All: Introduction
content:
Welcome to cjy’s blog!Greetings! This first blog will serve as an introduction, mainly focusing on three topics:Who am I, Why I choose to be a blogger, and What will I postSo read this blog first before moving on to other posts
Section 1: About meI’m Jiayi Chen(陈佳宜),born in 2007, currently pursuing an undergraduate degree in Artificial Intelligence at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (from 2025 to 2029). With a continuous aspiration to become a scientific researcher, my ideal is to achieve groundbreaking breakthroughs in the field of Artificial Intelligence, thus creating something that can really change people’s life.Feel free to contact meemail: chenjiayi0505@sjtu.edu.cn
